kpi.name: M84B9C3

kpi_info.title: Average number of subsc in specific VLR
kpi_info.use: For the calculation of the average, the number of subscribers is fetched from the HLR for each VLR at three-minute intervals. In the ASCII report the value can be marked with hashmark (#) if the counter is unreliable.

kpi.kpi_alias: Average number of subsc in specific VLR
